candidates.title: chore: update deps and fix clippy lints
candidates.body:
Simply bumping all dependencies to the latest version, and auto-fixing (with `cargo clippy --fix`) any currently reported lint warnings from Clippy.

I bumped the Rust version in the Dockerfile to the latest version, as it failed to compile. That's due to several MSRV bumps in the dependencies.

candidates.title: chore(deps): bump speculoos from 0.9.0 to 0.10.0

labels.name: rust
labels.description: Pull requests that update Rust code

candidates.body:
Bumps [speculoos](https://github.com/oknozor/speculoos) from 0.9.0 to 0.10.0.
Commits
  • b57da13 chore: bump manifest
  • bcbb591 chore: snake case for test function
  • cc64f77 8: Return reference to self from matches func to enable chaining
  • dafa0b7 Add in is_empty and has_length checks for HashSet
  • afb00d1 fix: fix rustc-serialize CVE
  • See full diff in compare view

candidates.title: Add bombadil watch feature
candidates.body:
Fixes #112.

I didn't write a test for this because frankly I think this is a hard thing to test but I can try if required.

candidates.title: Test/sealed test
candidates.body:
This PR refactors the whole test suite to use [sealed_test](https://crates.io/crates/sealed_test) on tests that uses 
bombadil link and bombadil install commands. 

Once the refactor is completed, these test will run on tmpfs with a fake home directory this way we can run the test suite
locally without overriding existing user dotfiles.

candidates.title: chore(deps): bump anyhow from 1.0.53 to 1.0.55

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [anyhow](https://github.com/dtolnay/anyhow) from 1.0.53 to 1.0.55.
Release notes

Sourced from anyhow's releases.

1.0.55

  • Documentation improvements

1.0.54

  • Construct more helpful error message from ensure! when the expression involves a negative literal const generic as the first generic argument of a method call (#224)
Commits
  • 3ca5036 Release 1.0.55
  • 6a31772 Add link from Context docs to Display representations
  • 471d6e9 Release 1.0.54
  • 76a0b48 Merge pull request #224 from dtolnay/negativelit
  • c38e117 Handle negative literal const generic argument after left arrow
  • c36c0fd Add test of negative literal
  • 91b027e Add test of literal in const generic path argument
  • 23a7fd5 Update ensure tests to nightly-2022-02-07
  • See full diff in compare view
